package.name: DarkChat
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Author: ""Dark Chat" is inspired by phrenzy's message style h4x0r. I made my version more legible. Sometimes your friend's screen name is so long that you don't know where the message starts. So I separete name and message into two lines in my version and change some details."
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=3154
